text: "All Hail, Liberia, Hail!" is the national anthem of Liberia. ==Lyrics== I ğ„† All hail, Liberia, hail! (All hail!) ğ„‡ This glorious land of liberty Shall long be ours. ğ„† Though new her name, Green be her fame, And mighty be her powers, ğ„‡ ğ„† And mighty be her powers, ğ„‡ In joy and gladness With our hearts united, We'll shout the freedom Of a race benighted, Long live Liberia, happy land! ğ„† A home of glorious liberty, By God's command! ğ„‡ II ğ„† All hail, Liberia, hail! (All hail!) ğ„‡ In union strong success is sure We cannot fail! ğ„† With God above Our rights to prove We will o'er all prevail, ğ„‡ ğ„† We will o'er all prevail, ğ„‡ With heart and hand Our country's cause defending We'll meet the foe With valor unpretending. Long live Liberia, happy land! ğ„† A home of glorious liberty, By God's command! ğ„‡ ==References== Category:Liberia Category:African anthems
title: All Hail, Liberia, Hail!
